fields.name: GroupIds
fields.description: The ID(s) of the group(s) obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to. Required on PUT (CreateOrUpdate) requests.

fields.name: PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState
fields.description: A collection of read-only information about the state of the connection to the private remote resource.

fields.name: PrivateLinkServiceId
fields.description: The resource id of the private link service. Required on PUT (CreateOrUpdate) requests.

fields.name: RequestMessage
fields.description: A message passed to the owner of the remote resource with this connection request. Restricted to 140 chars.
